name: Climax
description:
Welcome to the wonderous world of cinematographic storytelling! As two actors – the hero and the villain of a movie -, you and your opponent have to fight each other in the last scene of the movie, the long-awaited climactic duel between the heroic hero and the vile villain. Employ whatever weapon, object or unusual item you can grab to beat the crap out of the other actor, moving around a dangerous movie set. Prepare for the final confrontation between good and evil! Prepare for the last battle between two bitter rivals! Prepare for the… CLIMAX!

----------

Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course

of the Politecnico di Milano

Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria
